title: How do smart people study books? How do they remember? - Quora

response.answer_text: In art I was instructed to instead of memorizing, to create. When you create a thing, there is no need to remember it, as it becomes a part of you. It would be like trying to forget yourself. Learning has no expectations except growth. When you force it, naturally, it resists.
Well, you digest them. Taking notes and annotating them. Study the notes over a day, every other day, a week, and a month. Draw pictures. Use advanced learning techniques.
